## Dependency Update Notice

> [!WARNING]
> This PR updates Rider SDK and related dependencies to the latest EAP version.
> 
> **Action Required**:
> 1. Close and reopen this PR manually to trigger CI checks (GitHub security restriction)
> 2. Review the build output and test results carefully
> 3. Test the plugin against the new Rider version
> 4. Verify that all existing functionality works as expected
>
> **Breaking Changes**: EAP versions may introduce breaking API changes. Check the [Rider Release Notes](https://www.jetbrains.com/rider/whatsnew/) for migration guidance.
